H0.text: what was the code name of the us program to develop an atomic bomb. Trinity

H1.text: what was the code name of the us program to develop an atomic bomb. Aurora

H2.text: what was the code name of the us program to develop an atomic bomb. Eclipse

H3.text: what was the code name of the us program to develop an atomic bomb. Manhattan

A4.text: The Manhattan Project was a research and development program undertaken during World War II to produce the first nuclear weapons.

A5.text: The first nuclear device ever detonated was an implosion-type bomb during the Trinity test, conducted at White Sands Proving Ground in New Mexico on 16 July 1945.
